llm_command:
bash
kubectl apply -n default -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-cart-to-redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cartservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: redis-cart
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 6379
EOF
output:
bash: error reading input file: Bad file descriptor
Error from server (NotFound): networkpolicies.networking.k8s.io "allow-cart-to-redis" not found
